title: WHY CANT I POST ON LEAGUE NEWS
body: SO SAD NOT AUTHORIZED, SAYS I'M LEVEL 1 WHEN I'M 30

replies.body: You're showing as level 30 now, so yoru account just may have needed to sync.  Everything should be okay now!
Same here. But been playing for two months now, guess it's a problem? Match History syncs fine, even has the profile icon I purchased, just shows me as lvl. 2 still and idk why. Riot, can you help?
